children.name: TC705-Failed-->Reason: Error: element ("//android.widget.EditText[@text = "Compose"]") still not displayed after 10000ms
TC705 - To verify user is able to send a "Private Permalink" as reply/forward from compose section of conversation.
TC709-Failed-->Reason: Error: element ("//android.widget.EditText[@text = "Add a note"]") still not displayed after 10000ms
TC709 - To verify user is able to access "Private Permalink" from Activities/Notes if user is part of same SM
TC713-Failed-->Reason: Error: element ("//android.widget.TextView[@text = "Sorry! You do not have access to this conversation."]") still not displayed after 10000ms
TC713 - To verify proper error message is thrown if user edits the private permalink and tries accessing the same.

TC715-Failed-->Reason: Error: element ("//android.widget.TextView[@text = "(This conversation is part of multiple mailboxes, of which at least one has public links disabled)"]") still not displayed after 10000ms
TC715 - To verify "Public Permalink Generate" option is disabled If an SM or UG configuration does not allow users to create public permalink.
TC697-Failed-->Reason: Error: element ("//android.widget.TextView[contains(@text,"Updated by")]") still not displayed after 10000ms
TC697 - To verify the first name of the SM member who is created the public permalink is displayed below the popup modal
